players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I'm shocked and saddened by Diana's sudden demise. Let's all work together to figure out who could have done this."
Bob: "Let's focus on the facts and try to piece together what happened last night. We know Diana was killed, but we don't know who or why."
Bob: "I think we should ask Charlie about his alibi for last night."

Charlie: "I have an alibi for last night. I was at the outskirts of the town, hunting for food to bring back and share with everyone. I believe it's important that we all trust each other during this time of uncertainty."
